parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is strongly indicative of electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi Presedinte" and promotes voting for the USR team, clearly referring to a specific parliamentary candidate and party. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of hashtags further suggests an attempt to broaden reach and engagement. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party in the parliamentary elections. The call to action "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!" leaves no doubt about its electoral intent. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and is clearly designed to promote a specific candidate and party, rather than inform or educate the public.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, exceeding the bounds of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3944305055814200</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact date is not specified, the presence of the CMF suggests it's within the allowed period), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes), and goes beyond journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  The paid nature of the Facebook post and its targeting parameters (age, location) indicate a deliberate attempt to influence voters.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Elena Lasconi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 3944305055814200), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu mesajul "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi! Poziția 6 pe buletinul de vot. #ElenaLasconiPresedinte #USRlaguvernare CMF 11240015",  având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatei Elena Lasconi și a partidului USR.  Postarea, care a beneficiat de o investiție financiară între 100 și 199 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 50.000 și 100.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Mesajul direct, îndemnul explicit la vot și prezența CMF-ului demonstrează clar intenția de a face propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, constituind o încălcare gravă a legislației electorale.  Datele de contact ale USR Maramureș sunt disponibile la comunicare@usr.ro și +40743564061.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
